articles.description: Some fans have accused Forspoken of being cringey, but it doesn’t go far enough, and could lean into the whimsy of JRPGs more.
articles.content:
From Freys very first steps in the medieval fantasy land of Athia, Forspokens influences emerge in full force. 
She runs and ducks under broken walls in an abandoned castle with a giant dragon in pu… [+3586 chars]
